short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dynavisor TorrentPro(TM) Chrome Extension for archival, retrieval, and advanced search of Salesforce objects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dynavisor TorrentPro(TM) Salesforce Data Management Service enables Salesforce users to selectively archive Salesforce objects to a remote database-as-a-service offered by a cloud provider, and to selectively retrieve them on a need-basis. Also offered is an advanced search interface to dynamically perform deep queries spanning Salesforce and multiple remote database-as-a-service targets.
